c74object.name: ta.safeprompt
c74object.description: Prompt user for a yes/no confirmation. This is useful for cautious procedures, where the user should be asked before running that procedure (ex: deleting files).

outlet.digest: bang If User input Doesn't Match (neither yes nor no)

objarg.name: label
objarg.description: Sets the prompt which will appear above the text entry box in the dialog window.

method.name: bang
method.digest: Prompt for text entry with default
method.description: In left inlet: Opens the dialog box with the previous text displayed as the default.

example.caption: Safelly prompt the user before deleting a file.

c74object.discussion: Note that this object is not case sensitive nor word sensitive. Meaning that if you type anything starting with a "y" it will assume a positive confirmation. (For ex: typing "yOdDlE" is the same as typing "yes")

entry.name: bang
entry.description:
Out leftmost outlet: if user gives positive confirmation ("yes").
Out middle-lef outlet: if user gives a negative confirmation ("no").
Out middle-right outlet: if user confirmation doesn't match with "yes" or "no".
Out rightmost outlet: if user hits "cancel".
